abstract: Warren Buffett, the chairman and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, explains why Berkshire will have more luck buying private businesses than public companies, in this video interview with CNBC’s Becky Quick.
snippet: Warren Buffett, the chairman and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, explains why Berkshire will have more luck buying private businesses than public companies, in this video interview with CNBC’s Becky Quick.
lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett, the chairman and chief executive of Berkshire Hathaway, explains why Berkshire will have more luck buying private businesses than public companies, in this video interview with CNBC’s Becky Quick.

headline.main: Warren Buffett Hints at Next Deal
